sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './albumsp.css'; import ahap from '../../res/song5.png'; import moon from '../../res/moon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { graphcms, TRACK_POSTS, options } from '../../graphql/Queries'; import useQueryPosts from '../../hooks/useQueryPosts'; const Tracksp = () => { const { posts, error} = useQueryPosts({query: TRACK_POSTS}); if(error) return

{error}

return (

TRACK REVIEWS

{posts.length > 0 &&

{posts[1].title}

{posts[1].artist}

{new Date(posts[1].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

{posts[2].title}

{posts[2].artist}

{new Date(posts[2].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

{posts[3].title}

{posts[3].artist}

{new Date(posts[3].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

{posts[0].title}

{posts[0].artist}

{new Date(posts[0].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

}
) } export default Tracksp
